Text: PUC Staffs Questions for January Technical Conference Cc are attached We are hoping that answers to these questions help everybody to have a better understanding of the way different ERCOT markets will operate after June See you tomorrow Parviz Adib Ph D Director of Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas N Congress Avenue PO Box Austin Texas Ph No Fax No email TechnicalConferenceNCdoc

PUC Staffs Second List of Questions for January Technical Con ference Cc another list of ten questions to those who attended todays prehearing conference at the PUC regarding Docket No ERCOT Protocols A copy is attached for your information that includes a question related to confidential documents filed by ERCOT ERCOT did not object to sharing this question with you You may remember that an early commitment was made on behalf of ERCOT to file written answers to question numbers through of Staffs first list of ten questions You got that list as an attachment to my earlier email on January Today we also requested that written answers to be filed by ERCOT on January to cover question numbers in this attachment In addition a draft copy of a paper by Dr Shams Siddiqi ERCOT Local Congestion Management Potential for Market Abuse was distributed today to facilitate related discussion on January Unfortunately I do not have an electronic copy of that paper to share with you See you on January Technical Conference Parviz Adib Ph D Director of Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas N Congress Avenue PO Box Austin Texas Ph No Fax No email TechnicalConferenceMaindoc

Additional PUC Staff Questions for January Technical Conferenc e Cc find the third set of questions by the PUC Staff regarding the ERCOT Protocols Some of the questions in this set are from our Consultant Dr Shmuel Oren See you on January Technical Conference Parviz Adib Ph D Director of Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas N Congress Avenue PO Box Austin Texas Ph No Fax No email TechnicalConferenceMainAdddoc

Dr Orens Solution on Congestion Management Order No Cc of Dr Orens paper Efficient Intrazonal Transmission Pricing is attached In addition Judge Cooper issued Order No today A copy is attached for your information See you in the Commission Workshop on February Parviz Adib Ph D Director of Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas N Congress Avenue PO Box Austin Texas Ph No Fax No email doc ERCOTCongdoc
